nodes.bodyText: It would be helpful to add status also to toString method

Created and Suspended are considered as ActiveTasks?
https://github.com/kiegroup/jbpm/blob/master/jbpm-services/jbpm-kie-services/src/main/java/org/jbpm/kie/services/impl/RuntimeDataServiceImpl.java#L486-L495
it is a matter of definition. If a task is created means you reached the node of human task so it is active but not assigned. Suspended means the task is still on going but nobody is working on it.
Same question here: from the rest of statuses Completed, Failed, Error, Exited, Obsolete, not sure if only should apply Completed.

completed means that the control flow is outside the human task node.
Obsolete means that the node has been cancelled without being executed
failed means ht raised a problem
error means the ht raised an exception
the reset are self explainable.
